data.title: Short to Truck Post Plant Molly
data.description: Here's a simple post plant molly lineup to force Attackers off the spike at the default plant spot.

data.title: Short to Triple Box Post Plant Molly
data.description: Here's a simple post plant molly lineup that will damage any Attacker defusing the spike at Triple, it spreads to the corner of it.

data.title: Fast Front B Site Post Plant Molly
data.description: Use this quick and powerful post plant molly to play aggressive with, as you are able to contest and stall for more time.

data.title: Early Round U-Hall Ultimate to Take Site Fast
data.description: Use this Ultimate ability to quickly clear out U-Hall at the very beginning of the round, setting up duelists with abilities like Jett's Dash or Raze's Blast Packs up to take control of U-Hall immediately after the Ultimate ability clears it out.
